ai-atk-s0402a50:2_0: Like the moon in the first phrase in the five ways, namely, the brightness in the case of the moon, and sun.
ai-atk-s0402a50:4_1: In the second tetrad, etc., respectively in the case of the moon’s radiance,
ai-atk-s0402a50:4_2: like the moon in the bright moon,
ai-atk-s0402a50:4_3: like the moon shining in the bright moon,
ai-atk-s0402a50:4_4: Like the moon in the lamp,
ai-atk-s0402a50:4_5: In this way the meaning should be understood in all ways.
ai-atk-s0402a50:6_1: The sixth time when the supreme,
ai-atk-s0402a50:6_2: listening to the Dhamma at the right time, which is supreme in the Dhamma,
ai-atk-s0402a50:6_3: Questioning about the Dhamma, questions on the Questions of the Dhamma,
ai-atk-s0402a50:8_1: At that time they are a term for the seven profitable states, and so on.
ai-atk-s0402a50:8_2: While they were doing so, they lead (them).
ai-atk-s0402a50:8_3: yet they attain the ending of defilements.
ai-atk-s0402a50:8_4: The eighth section for recitation is finished.
ai-atk-s0402a50:10_2: a pleasing talk in the mind, having dropped out what is known as the point of what is known,
ai-atk-s0402a50:10_3: having virtue: Ten Sets virtue, guards virtue and concentration.
ai-atk-s0402a50:11_0: The fifth sub-chapter on developed is finished.
ai-atk-s0402a50:12_0: The third group of nine is finished.
